name: Project Run (SonusLumine)
description:
This is a vertical slice of an old academic project I want to share. This will be fun for anybody interested in a bit of a rhythmic challenge. Only one level was made so it shouldn't be more than 5 minutes of gameplay. 

Disclaimer: I do not own the art nor the music, I just found many of the assets online, animated them, programmed them and threw them together into this school project. If you know any of the original artists please let me know so I can rightfully credit them.

Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nqqc2FHf9Ug
